data.quote: May your journey through life be vibrant and full of colorful rainbows.
data.author: Harley King

data.quote: Being negative only makes a difficult journey more difficult. You may be given a cactus but you dont have to sit on it.
data.author: Joyce Meyer

data.quote: Sometimes you dont know when youre taking the first step through a door until youre already inside.
data.author: Ann Voskamp

data.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: There is no right or wrong way to write a novel. Each journey is different for every individual work and for every writer. The first error is never to begin the second is never to finish.
data.author: Don Roff

data.quote: the most important reason for going from one place to another is to see whats in between and they took great pleasure in doing just that.
data.author: Norton Juster

data.quote: It seemed like all the way to tomorrow and over it to the days beyond.
data.author: J.R.R.Tolkein

data.quote: A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.
data.author: Steve Maraboli
